bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXII (Nos 4301-4351) with contributions by C.F.L. AUSTIN, P.G. McC. BROWN, W.E.H. COCKLE, R.A. COLES, E.W. HANDLEY, M.A. HARDER, R. HÜBNER, P.J. PARSONS, J.R. REA, M.D. REEVE

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXII, 4301-4351. - I. Comedy (4301-4305). - II. Mythography (4306-4309). - III. Demosthenes (4310-4333). - IV. Documents of the Roman and Byzantine Periods (4334-4351).
bibl.seg: SHELTON J.C. and J.E.G. WHITEHORNE, with contributions by C.F.L. AUSTIN, P.G. McC. BROWN, W.E.H. COCKLE, R.A. COLES, E.W. HANDLEY, M.A. HARDER, R. HÜBNER, P.J. PARSONS, J.R. REA, M.D. REEVE, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXII (Nos 4301-4351). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 82.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1995, 8°, [xii]-182 pp. et XII pll. ISBN 0-85698-127-3. £60.
P. Oxy. LXII, 4301-4351. - I. Comedy (4301-4305). - II. Mythography (4306-4309). - III. Demosthenes (4310-4333). - IV. Documents of the Roman and Byzantine Periods (4334-4351).

C.R. par W. Appel, JJurP 26 (1996) pp. 216-218. - Roger S. Bagnall, CR N.S., 48 (1998) pp. 149-153 [concerne aussi: P. Oxy. LXIII]. - Jean Lenaerts, ChrEg 73 (1998) No. 146, pp. 362-365. - G.M. Parássoglou, Hellenika 47 (1997) pp. 159-160. - Hans-Albert Rupprecht, ZSav 116 (1999) pp. 600-603 [concerne aussi: P. Oxy. LXI].
Shelton Whitehorne Austin Brown Cockle Coles Handley Harder Hübner Parsons Rea Reeve
